Segment.name: TD1
Segment.comment: To specify the transportation details relative to commodity, weight, and quantity

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: CommodityCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: LadingDescription
Field.comment: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

Field.name: WeightQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken
